title: Newly remodeled 1 bed / 1 bath with upgrades galore!
map_address: 3500 North Point Parkway near Cypress Ct
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom  1 Bathroom | 850 sq ft | $1915/Month', 'IMT Alpharetta', '3500 North Point Parkway', 'Alpharetta, GA 30005', 'show contact info', 'Description:', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'IMT Alpharetta is located within the blue award-winning Creekview Elementary, Webb Bridge Middle & Alpharetta high school districts and has close proximity to Avalon Shopping District and North Point Mall.', 'With close proximity to MARTA, IMT Alpharetta gives residents an easy commute and all the best that the greater Alpharetta area has to offer.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Apartment Amenities:', '➢ Ceiling Fan', '➢ Detached Garages in Select Homes', '➢ In-Home Washer/Dryer', '➢ Laminate Countertops in Classic Homes', '➢ Monitored Alarm System Available', '➢ Private Balcony/Patio in Select Homes', '➢ Sunroom in Select Homes', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ White Appliance Package in Select Homes', '➢ Wood-Style Blinds', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '➢ Car Care Center', '➢ Playground', '➢ Pool', '➢ Access to Big Creek Greenway\xa0Walking Trails', '➢ Close Proximity to Avalon Shopping District\xa0& North Point Mall', '➢ Emergency Maintenance Service', '➢ MARTA Public Transportation Access', '➢ Online & On-Site Kiosk Access', '➢ Resort-Style Pool with Lap Lanes', '➢ Two Lighted Tennis Courts with\xa0Trainers Available for Coaching', '➢', 'Within\xa0Blue Award Winning Creekview Elementary, Webb Bridge Middle &\xa0\xa0Alpharetta\xa0High\xa0School Districts', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month', 'Pets: Pets allowed!', 'Two pet maximum.', 'Pet fee (non-refundable) is $300 per pet.', 'Pet rent is $25 per month per pet.', 'No weight restrictions.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'F20C1BC1A70846']
